FuncDef: The reset ipsec sa-expire statistics command clears the statistics of IPSec SA expiry.
CLIs: reset ipsec sa-expire statistics [ slot <slot-number> [ engine <engine-id> | card <card-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Indicates the engine ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

Indicates the card ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 0 to 1.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
You cannot restore the statistics once statistics are cleared.
engine and card options are supported only on the VSU board.
